      • eStore

      • getAllInstances

        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> getAllInstances(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass eClass)
        Computes the set of instances of the given EClass (including its sub-types).

        This method is similar to getAllInstances(EClass, boolean) with strict=false.

        Parameters:
        eClass - the EClass for which look for instances
        Returns:
        all the instances of the given EClass from the resource

      • getAllInstances

        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> getAllInstances(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass eClass,
                                                                                 boolean strict)
        Computes the set of instances of the given EClass.
        Parameters:
        eClass - the EClass for which look for instances
        strict - true if the lookup searches for strict instances
        Returns:
        if true then the method returns only the strict instances of the given EClass, otherwise it also returns the instances of the sub-types of eClass.
